data.text: @amxndareviews @ChloeGMoretz It's been 4 years already, have you seen the movie?
@ChloeGMoretz I know, Chloe. It would've been better, if the filmmakers would let you be the best choice of The Little Mermaid than Snow White. I love the idea of you as a Mermaid Character.

@ChloeGMoretz
